page.title: 16Family eating habits
page.content: Most people we spoke to began their day with breakfast at about 8.00am.It consisted of cereal,with milk and sugar,a slice of bread or toast with butter and jam or marmalade.They drank tea,coffee,milk or fruit juice.There were just a few who had a cooked meal of bacon and eggs. At lunch time it has become normal for people to eat a snack lunch of soup, sandwiches,crisps,fruit and perhaps a cake or biscuit. The main meal of the day is a cooked supper when all the family have returned home from work.Meat or fish is eaten with vegetables and potatoes followed by a sweet course.If the father worked from home (farmer) then these two meals were sometimes reversed.On Sundays however most families gathered together for a cooked meal at lunch-time.
